display_long_description: VRTIFY disrupts the way people enjoy music, allowing users to experience their music in new and amazing ways through virtual reality (VR), access exclusive content channels and live VR concerts and recitals. VRTIFY is available for every major VR headset including Oculus, Samsung GearVR and Cardboard. Inside the VRTIFY music platform, users can listen to hundreds of songs from their Spotify subscription and My Music accounts, enjoying these in unique filmed and virtual environments that complement their mood, from a relaxing beach cabana to a thrilling flaming volcano. You can also join your favorite concert or recital, bringing your favorite artists so close you will be tempted to reach out and grab them. The VRTIFY 3D/360 immersive Video and Audio technology will provide a transcending, multi-sensory, viewing and listening experience that will keep you coming back for more. More info go to http://www.vrtify.com
